name: ReferencedAssembliesExplorer
description: Retrieves referenced assemblies from a .NET project file (.csproj) with support for filtering and pagination

arguments.name: projectFileAbsolutePath
arguments.desc: The absolute path to the project file (.csproj)

arguments.name: fullTextFiltersWithWildCardSupport
arguments.desc: Optional full text filters with wildcard support (e.g., 'System.*', '*Json*')

name: NamespacesExplorer
description: Retrieves namespaces from specified assemblies with filtering and pagination support

arguments.name: projectFileAbsolutePath
arguments.desc: The absolute path to the project file (.csproj)

arguments.name: assemblyNames
arguments.desc: Optional assembly names to filter by (without exe/dll extension). If empty, all assemblies are considered

arguments.name: fullTextFiltersWithWildCardSupport
arguments.desc: Optional full text filters with wildcard support

name: NamespaceTypes
description: Retrieves types from specified namespaces with filtering and pagination

arguments.name: projectFileAbsolutePath
arguments.desc: The absolute path to the project file (.csproj)

arguments.name: namespaces
arguments.desc: Optional namespaces to filter by. If empty, all namespaces are considered

arguments.name: fullTextFiltersWithWildCardSupport
arguments.desc: Optional full text filters with wildcard support (e.g., '*Controller', 'Service*')

name: NuGetPackageSearch
description: Searches for NuGet packages on nuget.org with filtering and pagination

arguments.name: searchQuery
arguments.desc: The search query to find packages

arguments.name: fullTextFiltersWithWildCardSupport
arguments.desc: Optional full text filters with wildcard support

arguments.name: includePrerelease
arguments.desc: Include prerelease versions in search results (default: false)

name: NuGetPackageVersions
description: Retrieves version history and dependency information for a specific NuGet package

arguments.name: packageId
arguments.desc: The package ID to get versions for

arguments.name: fullTextFiltersWithWildCardSupport
arguments.desc: Optional full text filters with wildcard support

arguments.name: includePrerelease
arguments.desc: Include prerelease versions in results (default: false)
